entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
